definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: clay, potsherd (Targumid.; Chr-Pal. h.sp0 clay vessel, h.s.bon0 pl. potsherds Schulth:68, Syr. h.es.po0 potsherd; Targum[[חחְבָא]], NH [[חָחָב]] clay vessel; As ḫaṣbu, id., h.ezbo0 jar (PS:1238), whence Ar. xazafa pottery Frä:169, but Sab. [[חסף]] jar, acc to Hom:ZMG Hom:xivi (1892), 532; cf. Eth. s’ah.b: jar (transp.; Di:1265); v.BH [[[חַסְפַּם]]]);—´[[ח]]: abs. Da 2:41 ([[דִּי פֶּחָר]] ´[[ח]]:), [[חֲסַָף]] v:Da 2:33, v:Da 2:42; cstr. [[טִינָא]] ´[[ח]]: v:Da 2:41, v:Da 2:43; emph. [[חַסְפָּא]] v:Da 2:34, v:Da 2:35, v:Da 2:43, v:Da 2:45.
